post.author: K. Kwon
post.content:
The company I am working at is looking to hire additional developers for new project.

Position : Programmer(intermediate level)

Java, J2EE, JSP/Servlet, RMI, JMS
Oracle, HTML, JDBC
Application Server(jBoss, IBM Websphere or BEA Weblogic)
Telecommunication

If you are a good fit and interested in this position, please forward your resume to me.
I will arrange to setup an interview.

fkwon@mobiledx.com
www.mobiledx.com
post.title: Looking for Java Developers
